data.name: abandoned dedication
data.description: A small wooden box found among the ruins haunted by remnant Archons. Every morning the Archon Inquisitors cleansed their blades as part of a ritual in veneration of the Architects. This cleansing box was abandoned in the struggle.

data.name: abandoned humility
data.description: A golden circlet. It would look beautiful atop your head, wouldn't it? And no one elses.

data.name: abandoned restraint
data.description: A small case sometimes used by the Codex monks to store their prayer beads. It was found among the ruins haunted by remnant Archons and is caked dried blood.

data.name: accursed bracer
data.description: A simple leather bracer with a large metal faceplate attached to it. The mouth slowly opens and drools oil if the wearer becomes agitated.

data.name: adherent's contradiction
data.description: A large pendant with a pellucid gemstone inlaid in a silver frame. The stone bears a crack down its center. Radiant light swirls on one end and umbral Gloom upon the other.

data.name: ailed's cursed copper
data.description: A tarnished copper coin, chipped nearly beyond recognition. A vestige of power slumbers within. But only just.

data.name: ailed's cursed gold
data.description: Reforged and reborn. This pristine golden coin enchants all who look upon it. It is said in the depths of Evenor's mountains and hills, the Great Curse still slumbers.

data.name: ailed's cursed silver
data.description: A small silver coin with a single chip on one end. It feels strangely comforting to the touch. Brother Mithras, librarian of the Codex’s archives, left the order shortly after the founding of the Aurelian monastery. He took only a single Imperial silver with him.

data.name: alchemical tome
data.description: A haphazardly scrawled tome of potion recipes. In desperation, the Azure Shrikes began to drink the arcanic fuel known as Godsblood in a last ditch effort against the warring Rustred faction. Although the strength provided is fearsome, seldom do any who injest the liquid survive.

data.name: amulet of eternity
data.description: The Nightfall Sisterhood faded to obscurity shortly after the massacre at Kragan's Pointe. While the Maze generally tolerated their presence, Archons from the Avar faith acted swifly when news of the novel sect reached the Avar Throne.

data.name: amulet of fervor
data.description: The light from this amulet seems to originate from an encased star.

data.name: amulet of lingering light
data.description: An amulet forged from the tokens of those who fell to the Trial of the Lingering Light. Its shimmering band is threaded of unearned silverine scarves and the amulet itself is made of testament boxes which have been long since forgotten.

data.name: amulet of pyre
data.description: This necklace was empty before the battle, but after felling the Talon of Pyre, the socket has filled with an embered ruby.

data.name: amulet of the architect
data.description: A ceremonial gold pendant worn by the highest order of Aurelian monks.

data.name: amulet of the cycle
data.description: Adherents of the Cycle were well respected in the days before the Imperium. Some records suggest rather than endure persecution, they fled into the Frostmarch.

data.name: amulet of the silver codex
data.description: This pendant holds a fragment from the original Silver Codex, written by the Architects in the first age of the world. You cannot read the writing, but you can feel the power that emenates from it.

data.name: amulet of unpredictability
data.description: There's no telling what this might do.

data.name: ancient eye
data.description: Eye taken from the turtlesaur that hardened in a gemstone like rock after death. Looking into it displays faint shapes and shadows of the things it saw during its long life.

data.name: anti-chamelon cloak
data.description: The pelt of a wolf, fashioned into a cloak. The hair seems to have mutated; it shifts to an distinctly garish color in comparison to its surroundings.

data.name: arcanic-resistant glove
data.description: A glove used by workers in the godsblood mines. The material is resistant to arcanic fuel, though notably requires constant upkeep.

data.name: archon's eye
data.description: Emblazoned to shine with the visage of a golden sun, this medallion is the badge of an Imperial inquisitor. The Archon's Eye is said to expose both lies and weaknesses.

data.name: archon's false litany
data.description: Found in the arena stalked by the Archon Commander. A chorus of voices rise from this item; they scream for you to follow their descent into the Gloom.

data.name: archon's tome
data.description: A fanciful tome with text inked in silver. The tenets of the Avar Church were kept by its Archon Inquisitors at all times.

data.name: argent hand
data.description: A severed, desiccated hand which remained after the Remnants known as The Argent Hand were culled from the Aurelian monastery’s halls. Ki wells from this relic, infusing its bearer with unparalleled striking power.

data.name: argent sash
data.description: A black sash in the same style as the silver scarves worn by those whom passed the Trial of Lingering Light. This garment denoted members of the Argent Hand and was a representation of their staunch loyalty to the First's teachings.

data.name: astalyn dancer's glove
data.description: Few Astalyn Dancers remain since the Shadow Nation’s rise. Though the martial tradition is not anathema to the Mother of Shadows’ teachings, few students of the dragons favored the Great Mother’s return.

data.name: astalyn dancer's necklace
data.description: The fourth trial is undertaken when the sun is highest. Once the young dancer has braved the fire, they are bestowed with a Astalyn scale. Many Eldren fashion their prize into something wearable.

data.name: astalyn dancer's ring
data.description: The ring of an Astalyn Dancer. A rarity amongst the Deep Eldren, these warriors divested themselves of the shadow's teachings to learn from the Astalyn dragons of old.

data.name: aturach's oath
data.description: A bloodied fang pried from the maw of a warbear. As a child, Aturach became lost in a snowdrift. The cave where he sought shelter was, in fact, a den for a local sleuth of bears. It is said when he emerged the following morning, he was missing a singular tooth, yet carried this fang in return.

data.name: azaar's art of blades
data.description: A rustic book featuring diagrams and instruction on the sword forms of the terrifying swordmaster known as Azaar, Storm of Blades. While the Woodwen people never hosted a traditional martial force, the older twin held a position of favor with Aturach for his skill with a blade. When Aturach led the Woodwen into the Gloom to end the threat, Azaar was among the first to fall.

data.name: azure ammo pouch
data.description: A pouch of ammunition engineered to be used in the arcanic rifles favored by the Shrikes.

data.name: badge of the throne
data.description: A badge affectionately passed down through the Shrike ranks. Typically worn by guardians of the Avar Throne, no one knows the true tale of how Salan Vex acquired this relic. Only that it burns perennially.

data.name: balgrim's totem
data.description: A broken and rotted tooth. The Balgrim hoard these, presumably, for the arcanic power that radiates from its remains. From what source is unknown.

data.name: balgrim's treasure
data.description: A pouch of refined minerals found amongst the remains of a Balgrim. The powder glitters in the moonlight.

data.name: band of courage
data.description: A sharp point projects from this steel ring; Maze soldiers jab themselves when they need a surge of adrenaline.

data.name: band of the rising sun
data.description: The sunrise on this golden ring inspires hope.

data.name: bandit's blindfold
data.description: A fine, white blindfold. Its edges seem burnt. This relic was once owned by a young girl who gazed upon a burning power. While her eyes were singed, it is said the great fire granted her sight by other means. An echo of that power yet remains.

data.name: barbarian's crown
data.description: A pin of gnarled wood and thorns vaguely in the shape of a crown. Only those who have soaked in the blood of the fighting pits and emerged victorious dare wear this.

data.name: barnacled conch shell
data.description: A large conch shell covered in barnacles harder than most rocks. One hit with the shell can break through most stone walls.

data.name: beastly claws
data.description: Glove that some Reaver Warriors use with large claws of an unknown beast. The blood rusted on the claws denote how many kills the warrior has.

data.name: belrand's oath
data.description: This relic was forged from a gemstone cairn hidden within the depths the Evenor. Words whispered long ago linger within. Whilst carrying it, you feel at peace.

data.name: bestial mantle
data.description: A pin in the vague shape of a bestial maw. Traditionally worn by those who conquered the beasts of the fighting pits.

data.name: black serpent bracer
data.description: The Black Serpents were the elite warriors of the infamous Venom Queen. This serpentine bracer numbs your pain receptors, granting the illusion of health.

data.name: blackstone bracer
data.description: A bracer forged of a sturdy black material. A cold sets into the blood of the bearer. And a want for destruction and death.

data.name: blackstone gauntlet
data.description: A gauntlet forged of a shimmering black material. A cold aura seeps from cracks in its exterior. In the heat of battle, the screams of the fallen stir in the bearer's ears, driving them to madness.

data.name: bloodspawn vial
data.description: A small glass container holding the few drops that remain of the Bloodspawn. When inside the Gloom, the ichor writhes furiously.

data.name: bloomborne ring
data.description: An ivory ring of unknown origins. Vibrant plantlife in its presence seems to decay, while waning flora grows in turn.

data.name: blooming claw
data.description: The preserved claws of a Lurker. Flora energies have found their way into cracks in the keratin, sprouting bright flowers from within.

data.name: blooming scarf
data.description: A bright green scarf overgrown with floral life. A little slice of peace seems woven into its threads.

data.name: bomb creation kit
data.description: A small bag with sectioned areas for explosive materials and casings. Easy to carry and put together bombs in a pinch.

data.name: bone doll
data.description: Several small bones tied together with a leather band that vaguely resemble a person. Its face, crudely drawn, has a large and almost menacing smile.

data.name: book of names
data.description: A collection of the secret names of the Architects, as complied by the Codex monks.

data.name: book of the eventide prince
data.description: A black book with silverine pages. The spellwork of the Eventide Prince was feared by all who opposed the Maze. It is speculated without the Prince, the Thousand Day War would have ended after the first year.

data.name: book of unwoven threads
data.description: Servant's hands wove a tapestry. Servant's hands would have it undone.

data.name: bottle of shadows
data.description: Shifting darkness is trapped within smoked crystal. This is an ember of purest night, and its cooling shadows strengthen your resilience.

data.name: bracer of abyssal fires
data.description: A nexus of darkness, fate and fire. An inferno builds in the quiet of the abyss. When it wakes, there is no telling what it shall burn.

data.name: bracer of birth and decay
data.description: All things were born. All things will perish. The strength in that certainty beats in this relic as if its very heart.

data.name: bracer of broken fate
data.description: It is said our fates are not woven into tapestry but thrust upon a great wheel. Uncaring of what turns might lift our persons, or crush us beneath its weight.

data.name: bracer of collapsing shadow
data.description: An echo of Shadow. Eternal night. The unknown abyss. The darkness has mutated. What was born now lends you strength.

data.name: bracer of enduring fire
data.description: The first flame. And one day, the final flame too.

data.name: bracer of erraticism
data.description: An echo of fledgling life. Strands of Chaos and Greed have mutated what once was. The power within grows without rhyme or reason.

data.name: bracer of gilded inferno
data.description: This relic emanates an oppressive aura of gilded embers. Sporadic torrents of this power surge within your veins.

data.name: bracer of memories
data.description: This leather bracer is engraved with sigils recording the life of an Avar monk. You can draw on the faintest echo of the monk, enhancing your strength and health.

data.name: bracer of ravenous decay
data.description: The twisting powers born of this relic hunger. They want for decay. They want for death.

data.name: bracer of regal flame
data.description: A bright and golden fire tempered by natural energies. The light cast from this relic projects as beautiful beads of radiance.

data.name: bracer of the flower knight
data.description: A worn bracer overgrown with plantlife. It is said Belrand the Butcher raided every settlement from Corlaan to Witherward, leaving naught but cinders in his wake. When he reached the Viridian Tower, his long campaign ended, and his transgressions were cleansed within the Tower's waters.

data.name: bracer of the gilded corpsebloom
data.description: Darkling vines infect this golden bracer. They hunger for succor of shadow rather than light.

data.name: bracer of unstable creation
data.description: A nexus of twisting powers struggle within this relic. While the power is great, you cannot help but feel it is always but moments from bursting.

data.name: brain matter
data.description: Shadow and chaos formed this twisted creature, and even the remains of its cerebrum swell with darkness. Lord Halar's researchers have begun to theorize Anchors within the Gloom will continue to innovate stronger and stronger defenses. How long will it be until we can no longer overcome them?

data.name: brass bear
data.description: In the Golden Aerie, warriors who carry the token of the Bear are renowned for their vitality and durability. When you carry this totem, you can feel the bear's might flowing through you.

data.name: brel's glove
data.description: The archery glove used by the terrifying marksman known as Brel, Storm of Thorns. In the time before the Fall, the younger twin led the Woodwen's hunters and foragers in service of their king. Each arrow used to hunt the Frostmarch's creatures was purified beforehand in a spirit pond, and if a creature's meat was used to feed the tribe, the young bowman would spread the carcass's ashes across his chest in remembrance.

data.name: briar hilt
data.description: A rustic but bladeless hilt ravaged by wild thorns. This hilt was forged from the essence of the Storm twins which commanded both Blade and Thorn. The relic instills ferocity in its bearer, though it pains them in turn.

data.name: brightburn scarf
data.description: A scarf of concentrated Solar energy. It burns with red and amber light, yet feels only comfortably warm to the touch.

data.name: broodmother's scarf
data.description: Knitted from the Broodmother's silk, this scarf seems to help the bearer blend into the shadows S'ilreth commanded. It smells of venom and blood.

data.name: buckle of raven
data.description: A large belt buckle with a smooth blue and purple gem inside. Legend says the Reaver King blessed it before giving it to his strongest warrior.

data.name: burned-out tracer
data.description: Tracer charred after multiple uses and exposure to battle. It still glows dimly.

data.name: burning feather
data.description: Only a few feathers are left when a phoenix is reduced to ashes. The flames are cool to the touch, but the feathers can absorb hostile arcane energies.

data.name: burning heart
data.description: Once this artifact pumped blood. Now, it is a jagged stone burning with ire. Few could bear such rage.

data.name: calcified wurm pouch
data.description: Hardened wurm flesh that once stored its food. Calcified by the Dark Star, it has faint Gloom energy and small crystals on its surface.

data.name: canary statue
data.description: Small rock statue of a canary in a birdcage with faded paint. If there is dangerous fumes around, the statue makes a soft whistling sound.

data.name: caretaker's necklace
data.description: A ruined necklace worn by Woodwen who tended to the Heart of the Woods.

data.name: cerebral defense
data.description: The Legion's shell was suprisingly tough. Its exterior has now been fashioned into a useable bracer, granting a modicum of defense in addition to the resonant powers of the Gloom-touched beast.

data.name: cerebral eye
data.description: Stolen corruption from the felled Legion. It has been refocused and reforged to resemble the haunting image of one of the creature's eyes. Despite the power it grants, you cannot help the feeling it watches you still.

data.name: champion's brooch
data.description: A sleek black pin engraved with the visage of a ferocious warrior stalwart against a horde, forged from the refuse of those who challenged you. Even outnumbered, even surrounded, a true champion rises.

data.name: chaosborne ring
data.description: A ring fashioned from a gemstone infused with the uncertainty of Chaos.

data.name: chaosborne sash
data.description: A sash brimming with Chaos energies. It seems to glitch and flicker in a way reminiscent of Gloomshadows.

data.name: charcoaled effigy
data.description: Effigy of a Hollowed One burnt and reduced to charcoal. The plantlife here seems to wither in its presence.

data.name: charged ether fragment
data.description: A raw sliver of chaos, shifting in color and brilliance. Its Chaotic emanations distract enemies, deflecting blows and strengthening your attacks.

data.name: charred antler pendant
data.description: Pieces of burned antler from an elder grazer were fashioned into this simple necklace. Although ravaged by fire, the antler's foundations remain untouched, suggesting some form of arcane protection.

data.name: charred circlet
data.description: A circlet charred nearly black. Whichever Shrike hoped to pawn this for a little coin will have a harder time than they hoped.

data.name: circlet of desire
data.description: A golden circlet. It would look beautiful atop your head, wouldn't it? And no one elses.

data.name: circlet of eternity
data.description: An obsidian circlet. Whatever comes, you shall linger.

data.name: circlet of fervor
data.description: A circlet brimming with light. It infuses you with a furious vigor.

data.name: circlet of the cycle
data.description: A simple circlet. The flowers adorning this item seem to fade and bloom indefinitely.

data.name: circlet of the fallen lancer
data.description: The gloomtouched gem on this circlet was taken from a Lancer corrupted by the Gloom.

data.name: circlet of unpredictability
data.description: A violet circlet. When upon your head, you begin to glitch and shudder violently.

data.name: codex locket
data.description: Shaped like a book, this locket holds a fragment of the original Silver Codex–the book said to have been written by the Celestial Architects at the dawn of the second age. Arcane power pours from this small scrap of parchment, infusing vibrations into the air.

data.name: codex of secret songs
data.description: The First Scribe came up from her Repository and bequeathed the monks with new hymnals to replace the old. It was filled with songs the monks were never supposed to sing.

data.name: codex of the shadow's whisper
data.description: This small book holds many secrets, but it can only be read in darkness.

data.name: codex of the twisted roots
data.description: This bark-bound book reflects on the mysteries of sun and soil.

data.name: cog in the machine
data.description: A small, white cog forged from the debris of the Shrike's rampaging drill machine. An unnerving heat boils your blood at the touch. While the Shrike machine's learning capabilities were developed via arcanic innovation, its power source has remained a mystery.

data.name: comb of chaos
data.description: This golden comb creates more knots than it removes, but it sharpens your eyes and your blades.

data.name: conflux scarf
data.description: A strange conflux of godsblood, Storm energies, and the power of Greed have fused into the memory this scarf was drawn from. It now subsists as a vestige of power.

data.name: conqueror's chain
data.description: Gragor Steelskin was the first great champion of the Maze. He forged this chain from the manacles he'd worn as a prisoner of the Empire, and it channels a fragment of his rage.

data.name: consumed effigy
data.description: This effigy is carved from a unusually crimson wood. It evokes a visage of a figure consumed by fire yet refuses to burn.

data.name: corrupted amulet
data.description: An amulet infused with the corruption seeded within the Shatterlands. The old powers are waking. The Heart will have its revenge.

data.name: corrupted ring
data.description: A simple ring overtaken by the corruption of the Hollow Heart. While Lord Halar’s arcanists have yet to understand the intricacies of how the Heart works its seeds through the Gloom to reach distant lands, the threat it poses is clear. Left unchecked this corruption might grip everything we know.

data.name: corrupted totem
data.description: A small sculpture of a panther that has been overtaken by Shadow and Gloom, warping its features in unnatural ways.

data.name: creed's radiance
data.description: Undefeated in combat, Commander Creed was renowned for his mastery over Radiant energies. While tarnished and worn, this vambrace still gleams with that power, instilling the strength of the Archons within its wearer.

data.name: creed's seal
data.description: The silver emblem of a fallen Archon Commander. Charged by the upper echelon's of the Imperial church to excise the heretical threat brewing in Aurelian, Commander Creed of the Archon Inquisitors marched his legion into the Westreach to never be seen again.

data.name: crown of the stern
data.description: A circlet used as a crown by a short-lived Shrike leader. The words 'Lord Pretentious' are carved into the metal.

data.name: crumbling ring
data.description: While the ring itself seems in pristine condition, the state of reality surrounding it is crumbling.

data.name: crystallized ichor
data.description: The awakened ichor which formed the Bloodspawn has crystallized in the abscence of the Gloom.

data.name: damaged diamond earrings
data.description: Gold earrings with large diamonds. The gold is bent and scuffed like they were put away in a hurry.

data.name: damaged drill head
data.description: A drill head broken off from one of the mining drills the Shrikes use. Some Shrikes like to turn them into fashion accessories.

data.name: deafening charm
data.description: This amulet was often sold to travelers venturing through the Witherward Coast. Whether its powers truly protected a lone wayfarer from the danger of a siren's song is uknown.

data.name: deceiver’s ring
data.description: Ring taken from body of a Deceiver that might instead be worn as a bracelet. Its size seems to shift without reason, sometimes becoming so small it threatens to amputate its wearer's wrist.

data.name: dented crown
data.description: A dented crown of simple design. The golden lacquer has begun to chip away, exposing a frame of iron beneath.

data.name: dented shining circlet
data.description: A golden tiara with a broken gem in the center crusted with dried slime.

data.name: devourer's gaze
data.description: Torn cloth found in the den of Ryv'n the Devourer. Many souls fell to the twisted beast's claws. Their suffering stains their remains.

data.name: devourer's heart
data.description: A dark shard ripped from the remains of the twisted horror that haunted The Repository of Knowledge. Curiously, it seems to beat to the rhythm of a heart, though staring too long into its ink black surface sets an ache into your bones.

data.name: devourer's mantle
data.description: An amorphous gaze reaches from the abyss. The mantle of the Devourer is heavy. Can you withstand the hunger?

data.name: dormant deceiver’s eye
data.description: Large gem with pink and blue smoke swirling around. If placed near an object like a chest, it begins to shimmer as though it is attempting to change shape.

data.name: dragonkin blood
data.description: A vial of blood stolen from the corpse of a Dragonkin. Certain circles within the Avar Imperium touted the creature's blood as cure-alls for every ailment, healthy for one's skin, and even a powerful aphrodisiac. The truth of these claims has never been verified..

data.name: dragonkin hunting kit
data.description: Hunting parties formed for Imperium nobility often sought to target Dragonkin in pursuit of glory. Few survived.

data.name: dragonkin's scale
data.description: A singular scale pried from a felled dragonkin warrior. When cast in a beam of sunlight, both crimson and cerulean coloration can be seen.

data.name: dunce's crown
data.description: Rusted metal poorly fashioned into a mock circlet.

data.name: earthen might
data.description: A pendant with a piece of a Flora elemental encased in glass. Occasionally the wearer will glow light green.

data.name: eldren circlet
data.description: An Eldren circlet oft used as formal wear during by members of their elite forces.

data.name: eldren pin
data.description: Echoes, Shadow, and Duskal blood have birthed this relic. Born of Shadow, the Deep Eldren carried a connection to the element none but they could understand. Yet as the millennia passed and their numbers multiplied, the kiss of Shadow began to fade from their veins, stirring crises in their cities below.

data.name: eldren ring
data.description: Humans who wear Eldren treasures often die suddenly and unexpectedly.

data.name: embered cloth
data.description: Perhaps this once belonged to the monks or archons, but it is now charred beyond recognition. Solar energies have infused the threads, and embers now adorn its edges.

data.name: emerald fang
data.description: The Venom Queen slew her enemies with poison, but also used unusual toxens to strengthen her champions. This jade ring digs into your flesh with tiny fangs, and its venom enhances your resilience and resolve.

data.name: escavation gauntlet
data.description: A gauntlet powered by the element of Storm. While these models are primarily used in maintenance of Shrike machinery, they make excellent weaponry as well.

data.name: escavation team's toolbox
data.description: Arcanic repair devices sported by Shrike maintenance personnel.

data.name: essence of night
data.description: A locket formed of dark iron. It's sealed by a powerful enchantment and cannot be opened, but motes of shadow slip between the cracks.

data.name: eternal talon
data.description: Caela Firesky, the greatest skyrider of the Golden Aerie, tore this talon from the great phoenix Avalar. She wore the talon on an iron chain, extending her youthful vigor far beyond her prime. Until, one day, she saw fit to shatter the talon's bindings.

data.name: ethereal maw
data.description: An innocuous sable glove at a glance. Yet when infused with the rage of its master, the ethereal maw of the Gloom Panther manifests to rip and tear its foes.

data.name: eventide ring
data.description: This black-stone ring is cold to the touch. Kissed by darkness, its power grows with every death in its wake.

data.name: everbright ring
data.description: Upon first glance this brass ring is ordinary in every aspect. The discerning traveler may notice, however, a somber glow seems to light its bearer's way in Evenor's darker places.

data.name: everchanging codex
data.description: There's a new story every time you open this book.

data.name: evergreen cloak
data.description: The pelt of a great beast, fashioned into a cloak. The pelt seems to have mutated and instead resembles a lively mantle of flora.

data.name: evergrowing vine
data.description: Bracelet from vines growing from inside a Hollowed One. It constricts to fit tightly around your wrist.

data.name: exoskeleton wurm plating
data.description: Part of the Hungering Wurm’s outer armor, strengthened after its host ingested the Dark Star. Although long cracks are strewn throughout the plate, nothing can penetrate through it.

data.name: explorer's ring
data.description: This is most likely an unreleased item and can currently not be obtained.

data.name: fallen star shard
data.description: A raw shard taken from the meteorites plaguing the Highlands. Although these fallen stars seem to corrupt everything they touch, Wayfinders have proved suprsingly resistant.

data.name: fang of the beast
data.description: A fang pried from the Beast Master's prized warbear.

data.name: fatebreaker's favor
data.description: None held the Great Mother’s favor but her first love. Despite his convictions, she forged him a charm of watchful protection as a parting gift on the eve of war.

data.name: feather of war
data.description: Feathers fallen from one of the Beast Master's war birds.

data.name: fel horror's ring
data.description: This is most likely an unreleased item and can currently not be obtained.

data.name: fell claw
data.description: A curio in perfect resemblance of a beast's claws. The Engineer has warned that while the bearer will certainly draw strength from the outpour of Flora energy in this artifact, they may also experience the effects of a natural plague should they hold the relic for too long.

data.name: fell heart
data.description: This heart may have once belonged to a beast, but it has now become a putrid stone riddled with fungus and decay. The spores it emnates make those who inhale them feel bilious.

data.name: fitful bracer
data.description: A sleek bracer found in the depths of the mines. A small compartment allows the wearer to keep a stash of ammunition for arcane weaponry.

data.name: fitful gauntlet
data.description: This gauntlet shudders and thrums indiscriminately. Surges of chaotic power fill it seemingly at a whim.

data.name: five blessing ring
data.description: This silver ring engraved with the symbols of the Celestial Architects of the Empire. Though the Empire has fallen, the five blessings will strengthen those champions who stand against the Gloom.

data.name: flameborn claw
data.description: Wrinkles in the air obscure this relic's form, though the Engineer assures you that when witnessed in a cold enough climate, it shall resemble a Shroudstalker's claw. Regardless, vermillion embers flow freely from its center calling you to battle.

data.name: flametouched claw
data.description: The severed claw of a felled beast. Solar energy has seeped into its carcass. The claws burn all that they touch.

data.name: flamewood phoenix
data.description: Like the Phoenix, Aerie flamewood is restored when it burns. This token grants you a fraction of the resilience of the Phoenix, and can shield you from magical attacks.

data.name: flask of mystery
data.description: The contents of the flask are forever changing, but it always gives you strength.

data.name: flora-infused controller
data.description: The machinery used by the Shrike Syndicate is unlocked and controlled with arcanic pins distributed only to the toughest of their overseers. Usually powered by Godsblood, this instrument has been retrofitted and is overflowing with Flora energy.

data.name: flora’s focusing beads
data.description: Prayer beads given to you by the Curator. He claims that performing repetitious mantras and meditation with the beads might reveal new secrets concerning the element of Flora to the user; despite multiple attempts, the beads remain ordinary.

data.name: floraborne ring
data.description: A ring fashioned from a gemstone infused with the caress of Flora.

data.name: floral mixture
data.description: A mixture of ground herbs and flower petals slowly wither within this pouch.

data.name: forgotten effigy
data.description: A small effigy sculpted from smooth black stone. The details in the figure seem to suggest it portrayed a nebulous figure attuned to the fauna and flora of the woodlands, but with so much degradation, identification seems impossible.

data.name: forgotten valor
data.description: A box bearing the sigil of the Imperial Chruch found among the ruins haunted by monks of the Silver Codex. This artifact was a prize awarded to Imperial Archons for distinguished feats. Though, before its bearer's passing, it was surrendered in cowardice.

data.name: fox face ring
data.description: Small stone ring with a fox head emblem in the middle and green jewels for its eyes. Occasionally the eyes glow for a moment and the emblem gives a small grin before returning to normal.

data.name: frenzied spores
data.description: Hardened leaf from the Turtlesaur’s neck marred with acid. You can feel it pulsing with Flora energy.

data.name: fungal tooth
data.description: An enormous tooth pulled from the mouth of a deceased Thunderer. A thick green fungus has cultivated the remains. Flora energy blossoms continually from the tooth, making it strangely warm to the touch.

data.name: gaudy pendant
data.description: An opulent ruby lined with diamonds on either side of a heavy golden chain. The back bears evidence of an inscription that has faded away with age.

data.name: gauntlet of inquisition
data.description: The Archons are the inquisitors of the Avar Imperium, charged to root out heresy and all forms of evil. They enforce justice with an iron fist—and this gauntlet is that fist.

data.name: geartooth brooch
data.description: A rustic brooch worn by members of the Geartooth goblin clan. Tradition holds that fledgling hunters must venture into the Highlands and scavenge materials for a brooch before their Shuul will perform their initiation rites.

data.name: geartooth toolbox
data.description: A simple toolbox favored by the Geartooth Goblins. The wrenches within are perfect for tiny hands!

data.name: geartooth's spare cogs
data.description: Slightly charred cogs from a Geartooth gadget. Strange runes are inscribed on it. The Goblins seem to pay these parts an uncharacteristic reverence.

data.name: gemmed reaver amulet
data.description: A large, golden necklace worn by Reaver warriors. It pulses with Shadow.

data.name: glass pendant
data.description: Pendant forged from shards of Highlands Glass, a rock smoothed under the pressure of one of the Highlands' many waterfalls until hauntingly translucent. When held up to the light, it projects a rainbow.

data.name: glittering amber
data.description: A piece of perfectly smooth amber with a small butterfly encased inside. At night, the butterfly glows brightly and moves its wings ever so slightly.

data.name: gloom-touched bracelet
data.description: A simple golden bracelet that exudes faint Gloom energy.

data.name: gloom-touched bracer
data.description: A porous bracer made of hardened, Gloom-corrupted wurm shell. Though Avala's findings are still incomplete, the Seeker's researchers have agreed on one point. Wherever the darkling debris that corrupted this creature came from, we should be very afraid.

data.name: gloom-touched claws
data.description: Claws from a mighty beast that has been overtaken by Gloom. Smoke sometimes begins to spread out from them, as though it is attempting to recreate its host again.

data.name: gloom-touched forcipule
data.description: One of the pincer like appendages ripped from the carcass The Endless Hunger. Prolonged contact with a fragment of a fallen star twisted the great wurm into a bloated recepticle of Gloom energies. That power dwells within this forcipule still.

data.name: gloom-warped journal
data.description: Journal used by a researcher at Aurelian that has been transformed by the Gloom. While it can be opened, the pages are warped and mutilated, and the text is impossible to read.

data.name: gloomborne claw
data.description: Enormous and sharp. This set of claws has been forged from the bloodlust of a corrupted beast. Shadow calls from its depths, driving you to seek blood and battle.

data.name: gnarled chains
data.description: Old chains used with the mining equipment that have been rusted and gnarled together. Many Shrikes in the mines use them as make-shift hammers and fashion accessories.

data.name: goblin disassembly kit
data.description: Goblins will disassemble anything that isn't bolted down in ten seconds flat.

data.name: godsblood bracer
data.description: The power of Greed has crystallized the Godsblood upon the exterior of this bracer, coating it with an amber hue.

data.name: godsblood pendant
data.description: Necklace with a large yellow jewel characteristically similar to dormant Godsblood. Shrikes like to wear it as a status symbol.

data.name: gold-plated music box
data.description: A long broken music box plated with gold and covered with precious stones. The inside is lined with red velvet with remnants of gold dust from the items previously stored in it.

data.name: golden ashes
data.description: When a phoenix enters its death throes, golden ashes are born of its final inferno. The life force of the phoenix lingers in the ashes, strengthening those who bear them.

data.name: golden cloak
data.description: The pelt of a Shroudstalker, fashioned into a cloak. The pelt seems to have mutated coloring it a shining gold.

data.name: golden glove
data.description: A Shrike's glove encased in gold. If not for the strength of Greed flowing through this item, it would be entirely impractical to use.

data.name: golden heart
data.description: The innards of a Shroudstalker corrupted within the Reaver Woods. Its heart seems to have turned into pure gold. If you concentrate well enough, the Heart seems to melt into the shape of any currency of your choosing.

data.name: golden stalker claw
data.description: A golden relic styled to resemble the claws of a shroudstalker. A deep hunger wakes in the recesses of this artifact. It fills its bearer with the strength of desperation.

data.name: greedborne ring
data.description: A ring fashioned from a gemstone infused with the temptation of Greed.

data.name: green crystal phial
data.description: Perfect for holding dewdrops or blood.

data.name: guiding glove
data.description: A sleek glove found within the mines. It seems to glow dimly when worn.

data.name: guiding guantlet
data.description: A guantlet adorned with a brightly yellow gem. The Shrike this was found upon seems to have been killed by his compatriots. Judging by the scene around him, he put up quite the fight.

data.name: guiding voice
data.description: This sash glitters with a sheen reminiscent of brass. Kindred whispers caress the bearer, keen to light the fires of guidance to any who are lost.

data.name: heart of flame
data.description: Forged by Dalar of the Five Flames, this gem blazes with the power of a miniature star.

data.name: herbal powder
data.description: A small pouch holding a mixture of herbs and roots ground into a fine powder. Before the Gloom, the Woodwen were known throughout the Frostmarch for their potent medicines.

data.name: hieran's bracer
data.description: This steel vambrace was worn by the Imperial champion Hieran Mazaran during the bitter War of the Twelve Talons. Hieran stuck his arm into the maw of an Aerie maelwulf, and you can still see the gouges on the steel.

data.name: high sun amulet
data.description: This amulet was forged by Dalar of the Five Flames on the highest peak of the Dominion. Legend says Dalar tore a piece of the sun from the sky and fused it with the gold.

data.name: hollow heart
data.description: A knot of blackened wood vaguely in the shape of a heart. The interior is hollow. A scar left when a gloom corrupted spirit possessed this natural vessel.

data.name: hollowed one’s heart
data.description: Smooth bright orange gem found in the breastplate of Hollowed Ones. When held close to your ear, you can hear whispers in an unknown tongue.

data.name: horn of the deceiver
data.description: In-tact main horn recovered from the Deceiver. It pulses with Shadow and sometimes seems to shimmer like attempting to change shape.

data.name: ichor stained statue
data.description: A small stone statue in the likeness of a raven. Godsblood has set into the creases, gifting the icon a lurid glow.

data.name: idol of avarice
data.description: A statuette carved to feed a long forgotten force. You feel the idol drawing you to the deeper places of Evenor.

data.name: idol of sol
data.description: A statuette carved to venerate a long forgotten force. The idol does not seem to cast a shadow.

data.name: idol of the abyss
data.description: A statuette carved to placate a long forgotten force. You feel like the idol is somehow watching you.

data.name: idol of the unknown
data.description: A statuette carved to still a long forgotten force. The idol's wants are unknowable.

data.name: idol of verve
data.description: A statuette carved to nurture a long forgotten force. The idol feels somehow at peace in your hands.

data.name: imperial emblem
data.description: This gold medallion is emblazoned with the solar icon of the Avar Imperium. The Imperial city has been lost to the Gloom, but as long as champions cherish its memory, the Empire remains.

data.name: incendiary kit
data.description: A kit used by the Azure Shrikes in their turf war with the Rustreds. It may or may not explode in your pack...

data.name: infused ore
data.description: Remnants of the ore once sought from the ancient mine of Bal Duum. The dark mineral seems to have soaked in the surrounding Flora energies.

data.name: inquisitor's seal
data.description: The silver emblem of an Archon Inquisitor. Known as valiant warriors to those in service to the Avar Throne, outside the Imperium the Archon's ire was feared for centuries.

data.name: iron panther
data.description: Forged from blackened iron and infused with primal essence, this totem can increase your health and durability.

data.name: iron-bound song
data.description: A small black box bound in iron chains. The power of a siren's song was feared even by the warriors of the Maze. When hunting the cunning creatures, rangers were known to carry iron weapons. Why Siren's feared such a modest metal is still unknown.

data.name: ivory spoon
data.description: Made from the shell of a turtlesaur, this spoon toughens you up and strengthens your arm.

data.name: jade crane
data.description: The hunters of the Golden Aerie admire the grace and precision of the striking crane. This totem can guide your hand and increase your Crit Rating.

data.name: jewel-encrusted gauntlet
data.description: Leather gauntlet gilded in gold and accented with several precious gems. Greed energy sometimes seeps out of it.

data.name: jeweled butterfly
data.description: Ever shifting between caterpillar and butterfly, this Chaotic amulet grants resilience and resolve. Like the caterpillar, you can evolve to face your challenges.

data.name: key of dreams
data.description: A ring in the form of a silver key, wrapping around the finger. A symbol of authority among the Order of the Silver Codex, it's said to defend the bearer by manifesting a shield formed from dreams; but you've seen the Gloom, and this ring channels its energy.

data.name: lancer's matrix
data.description: The greatest creations of the Architects remain yet a mystery to us. Imperial scholars strived for years to determine by what forces their eon's old constructs still functioned, but study of the volatile Lancers and Guardians proved a dangerous feat. Now, at the very least, we know the Gloom can corrupt even them.

data.name: last breath
data.description: This phial holds the final breath of a fallen Primal.

data.name: lost devotion
data.description: A small case infested with moss and fungus. An imperial sigil marks the box, but whatever it was before has succumb to the elements.

data.name: lost ring
data.description: A discarded and bloodied ring found among the effects of the Reaver's prison camps. An engraving within reads: Together Always.

data.name: lost totem
data.description: A small metal statue of a long-forgotten hero of Westreach. It radiates the power of Order.

data.name: machinist's gloves
data.description: Gloves used by a famed machinist within the Shrike Syndicate. They have become worn with age and use, yet the materials hold strong.

data.name: machinist's journal
data.description: A leather-bound journal containing hundreds of diagrams featuring machinery enhanced with arcanic means. The models here seem far more advanced than any of Skylight's machinery. The final page is initialed HK.

data.name: machinist's lockbox
data.description: A small lockbox holding various arcanic 'brain' devices. True machine learning was a difficult feat even for the Imperium's finest engineers. Since the Gloomfall, such brilliance is coveted above all.

data.name: makeshift mask
data.description: A piece of tattered cloth used as masks by workers in the Bloodworks so that they might not breathe in arcanic fumes.

data.name: malformed pendant
data.description: A simple wooden pendant wittled into the shape of a gnarled vine. In the times before the Fall, the Woodwen of the Frostmarch bore these pendants in honor of woodland spirits. Corrupted by the Gloom, a hunger now twists the wood and swirls of smoke seep through its porous tendrils.

data.name: mantle of silence
data.description: This is most likely an unreleased item and can currently not be obtained.

data.name: mask of glory
data.description: Piece of a broken mask that many Reaver warriors wear. On the inside of the piece are countless tic marks - most likely the number of enemies the warrior felled before losing their mask.

data.name: master's horn
data.description: A small instrument in the style of a beast's horn. Forged from the remains of the Beast Master, sounding it seems to rile even the calmest beasts to abject frenzy.

data.name: maze emblem
data.description: A sharp point projects from this steel ring; Maze soldiers jab themselves when they need a surge of adrenaline.

data.name: mini golem toy
data.description: A small toy golem made from spare parts. Its eyes occasionally light up.

data.name: mini totem
data.description: Small wooden totem similar to the ones Reavers build in their woods. It pulses with Shadow.

data.name: mossy scarf
data.description: Once the scarf of a proud Archon Inquisitor, this garment has faded with age. Flora energies have bloomed within its threads, seeding the scarf with a mossy exterior.

data.name: mother's crown
data.description: A circlet fondly wrapped in a child's blanket. A bit of speckled blood has dried on the back.

data.name: mystic's focus
data.description: A small glass focus with a bright yellow flower trapped within. The glass is warm to the touch.

data.name: necklace of collapsing shadow
data.description: Multiple layers of Shadow have infused the stone of this amulet.

data.name: necklace of eruption
data.description: In the end, even fire itself is a part of the natural order.

data.name: necklace of gloom
data.description: Shadow and Chaos forge to form an energy we now recognize as the Gloom. It seeks to overwrite all that is and will ever be.

data.name: necklace of mayhem
data.description: A necklace forged in layers of Chaos. You shall not be bound by fate.

data.name: necklace of midas
data.description: All the gold in the world will be yours if only you've the strength to take it.

data.name: necklace of overgrowth
data.description: The stone of this necklace seems to secrete a dangerous acid. You may want to be careful when wearing this.

data.name: necklace of spotted sun
data.description: Solar energies have converged to form thjs trinket of flickering fires.

data.name: necklace of the hidden cache
data.description: A beautiful artifact stolen from the Hidden Cache of Taraxes.

data.name: necklace of unknowable decay
data.description: The stone of this amulet has been touched by Flora and Chaos.

data.name: necklace of unknowable fire
data.description: Some truths should never be known.

data.name: necklace of unstable creation
data.description: If you must fade... so shall it all.

data.name: night warden's bracelet
data.description: As he perished at the Fatebreaker’s hands, that which remained of Night’s creation shattered—devasted by the very stars he lit above. Only the Warden’s will lives on. Bound servants, guardians of the Night’s slumbering charge.

data.name: night warden's effigy
data.description: A tarnished effigy forged in veneration. When Night fell, so did his plans for these shattered lands.

data.name: night warden's jewlery box
data.description: While the Shadow Nation’s true goals seem fixated on something deeper within the Shatterlands, evidence of some archaeological sites organized by the Eldren have been found. This container has been kept with great care. Though not with reverence, but fear.

data.name: nyra's glove
data.description: The Iron Sisters oft favored armor infused with the slumbering powers of beasts. It is said every arrow shot by Nyra of Faralyn arced like lightning from above. A fraction of her power slumbers within this relic still.

data.name: obsidian claw
data.description: An obsidian relic styled to resemble the enormous claws of a Yeti. Silence follows this relic. Yet when the bearer strikes, they do so with the force of a monstrosity.

data.name: obsidian cloak
data.description: The pelt of a Yeti, fashioned into a cloak. The fur seems to have mutated. An aura of darkness surrounds it.

data.name: obsidian heart
data.description: Heart of a feral beast twisted by the kiss of Shadow. The muscle seems bound to your person and yet it is incorporeal to the touch. You cannot help but feel it will never leave you.

data.name: orb of solar
data.description: Developed by the Aurelian monks, a crystal orb glowing bright with Solar. It was used in Arclight Champion experiments.

data.name: orb of the architects
data.description: A clear orb with a strange machine inside that pulses occasionally with radiant energies.

data.name: ornate pearl ring
data.description: A large pool set on a simple silver band. The pearl shines with an unnatural light, and sometimes soft singing sounds like it is coming from it.

data.name: overseer's band
data.description: This cloth has been tarnished by moss. It seems it was once used as an arm band to distinguish Shrike overseers in the mines.

data.name: owl gryphon talon necklace
data.description: A black talon fashioned into a necklace.

data.name: pantherine vambrace
data.description: Eventide plates of armor protected the pantherine monstrosity stalking the woods outside Deepwood Holt. Its gloom-infused plates have been repurporsed for use by a Wayfinder.

data.name: parrying guantlet of the flower knight
data.description: A parrying guantlet layered with moss. This item was favored by the Viridian Tower's lone guardian

data.name: part of the song
data.description: A piece of the corrupted Lancer which remained after the battle. A strange rhythm beats on perpetually.

data.name: petrified wood statue
data.description: Small statue of petrified wood that resembles a turtlesaur. Small flowers grow from its back despite no soil.

data.name: plaguebearer's fang
data.description: This is most likely an unreleased item and can currently not be obtained.

data.name: plaguebearer's viscera
data.description: This is most likely an unreleased item and can currently not be obtained.

data.name: polished spectra ring
data.description: A small ring with a piece of Spectra in the middle. It swirls and changes form and color based on the season in the Highlands.

data.name: pouch of corrupted powders
data.description: A pouch of ground materials taken from the Hollow Ones. The Reavers seem interested in repurposing the corruption.

data.name: prayer beads
data.description: The name of an Architect is engraved on each bead, and the clicking of the beads is like a prayer.

data.name: preserved claw
data.description: The claw of a creature found within stores in the Undercroft. The monks extracted biological material to use in their facsimile simulations, though for what purpose the Seekers are still unsure.

data.name: preserved voice
data.description: Lord Halar believes this gem to be a prototype of the monk's Tracer Orbs. It seems to contain vestiges of a member of their Order's voice.

data.name: preserving box
data.description: A small box arcanically engineered to preserve the biological material used in the monk's experiments within the Undercroft.

data.name: prophet’s hilt
data.description: A sampling of the cloth used on the hilt of the Prophet's colossal weapon. Traces of lapis flame dance among its threads. Though, they do not burn.

data.name: protean ring
data.description: A small glass ring hosting a wisp of volatile light. When the relic settles upon a surface, the light within divides, forming a random array of gleaming dots.

data.name: purple geode pendant
data.description: Simple leather chain with a purple geode attached. The geode gives off a faint glow.

data.name: queen's crystal
data.description: Crystal stolen from the lair of the Broodmother. It still sings with Shadow.

data.name: queen's silk
data.description: A box made of arcanic resistant materials. A collection of crystalline silk has been stowed within.

data.name: rapacious ring
data.description: A simple golden band infused with the element of Greed. Small indents await the installation of jewels and gemstones. Just by wearing it you feel yourself... wanting.

data.name: raven skull focus
data.description: Four small raven skulls attached to a simple rod that jingles slightly when shaken. You occasionally hear raven calls despite no birds being near.

data.name: raven's memento
data.description: A small pin treasured by the Raven in his early days with the Shrikes. Its origin is unknown save it was gifted to him by a woman who abandoned the Syndicate for greener pastures.

data.name: reaver amulet
data.description: Collar of three bells with a gem in the center. The amulet evokes the visage of a Reaver's trappings. Fumes of Shadow seep from the gem, causing some plants to wilt at your approach.

data.name: reforged crown
data.description: The crown of the Bloodspawn, reforged via your command of the Gloom. This relic seems to adjust its size to accomodate its wearer and imbuing them with the strength of the resilience of the Godsblood-borne nightmare.

data.name: regal scarf
data.description: A regal scarf commissioned for the Imperium's Archon Inquisitors. Expeditions into the cold reaches of the Frostmarch were rare and after many failed attempts to tame the wilds, considered a fruitless effort.

data.name: remnant abbot ring
data.description: Worn by one of the abbots of Aurelian. The simple pale gold ring seems to glow with Radiant that helps to energize the soul.

data.name: remnant ardent's pendant
data.description: Worn by high priests within the Order of the Silver Codex in Aurelian. The gem in the middle swirls with a mysterious green smoke.

data.name: remnant enforcer bracer
data.description: Worn by one of the monks of Aurelian. While made of simple leather, it is warm to the touch. Monks claimed it helped them to break through their opponents defenses.

data.name: remnant head researcher bracelet
data.description: Worn by one of the head researchers of Aurelian. A simple golden bracelet with an orange gems that glows with Radiant.

data.name: remnant prayer totem
data.description: Commonly used by the monks of Aurelian. A small wooden totem in the shape of a diamond with gold paint lovingly painted into a unique pattern.

data.name: remnant radiant focus
data.description: Commonly used by the monks of Aurelian. A small golden loop with smaller loops attached used as a focus to channel Radiant light when forced into combat against a stronger opponent.

data.name: renek's blindfold
data.description: A blindfold once used by Renek the Stern in a shooting contest. Still managing to shoot nine of the ten targets, he took the lion's share of the gambler's pot.

data.name: renek's bloodied badge
data.description: On the night Renek the Stern took power of the Shrikes, he imposed a detailed hierarchical system upon the Syndicate including badges determining rank and a demand of the use of uniforms. He was assasinated approximately twenty-seven minutes later.

data.name: researcher's journal
data.description: A leatherbound book full of notes of experiments conducted by an Aurelian monk.

data.name: residue of creation
data.description: The foundation is crumbling.

data.name: restored effigy
data.description: A torrent of power has flowed into this jade effigy. The figure it presents seems vaguely human to the eye, but touching the relic fills your mind with visions of erupting power. Hot and formless and eternal.

data.name: rigor's pendant
data.description: A golden pendant with a large blue jewel in the center. The histories say this pendant was bestowed upon the fiercest inquisitor the Imperial church had ever known upon his consecration as an Archon Commander. Though his birth name has been lost to time, the Seeker's archives suggest he took the name Rigor.

data.name: ring of absurdity
data.description: Is it made of candy? Does it change color based on your mood? We're not sure.

data.name: ring of an ending star
data.description: From fire it came and from fire it will fade.

data.name: ring of blackflame
data.description: A ring forged to defy the fiery threads of fate.

data.name: ring of broken fate
data.description: Before those whom shaped Evenor arrived, there was Chaos. One day, it will return.

data.name: ring of collapsing shadow
data.description: A ring forged in the blackest of nights.

data.name: ring of corpsebloom
data.description: A ring forged in a pit starved of light and flourishing with decay.

data.name: ring of desire
data.description: A greed infused ring bearing the inscription: "To live is to desire."

data.name: ring of eternity
data.description: A shadow infused ring bearing the inscription: "Light fades. We remain."

data.name: ring of fervor
data.description: A solar infused ring bearing the inscription: "A star shines from within."

data.name: ring of gilded life
data.description: Life brings fortune. Fortune brings life.

data.name: ring of golden fire
data.description: A ring forged in the fires of Greed.

data.name: ring of graal
data.description: This is most likely an unreleased item and can currently not be obtained.

data.name: ring of perfect gold
data.description: This one ring has been forged into a perfect golden band. It is... precious.

data.name: ring of pyre
data.description: A simple brass ring encrusted with a large ruby, forged from the remains of the Talon of Pyre. The heat given off by this relic's gemstone is nearly unbearable to any but its wearer.

data.name: ring of rebirth
data.description: The phoenix's cry shall never end.

data.name: ring of silence
data.description: You hear naught but the voice within.

data.name: ring of the coming star
data.description: The stone upon this ring was refined from the meteorites crashing into the Highlands. With the Engineer's aid, its corrupting power seems to have stabilized, granting a steady supply of darkling strength.

data.name: ring of the cycle
data.description: A flora infused ring bearing the inscription: "We live. We perish. We live again."

data.name: ring of the mandrake
data.description: The jewel on this ring seems to steal a little piece of each life in its wake.

data.name: ring of the setting sun
data.description: The sunset on this silver ring promises peace.

data.name: ring of unpredictability
data.description: A chaos infused ring bearing an inscription that seems to change each time you look.

data.name: ring of unstable creation
data.description: This ring glitches in a pattern remniscent of Gloomshadows. You feel... distant when wearing it.

data.name: ritual bone
data.description: A carefully carved bone to be used in a Reaver totem. Its origin is unknown.

data.name: ritual cage
data.description: A wooden box locked with Reaver magic. After sunset something inside knocks violently.

data.name: ritual eye
data.description: An eye with grayed pupils. It seems to bleed the deeper one ventures into the woods.

data.name: ritual totem
data.description: A small wooden totem stained with blood. An eerie hush seems to fall upon the woods in the presence of this figure. If one listens closely, chanting eclipsed by screams might still be heard.

data.name: rotting amulet
data.description: This is most likely an unreleased item and can currently not be obtained.

data.name: royal adherent's focus
data.description: A pure black jewel touched by the Eventide Prince. Only his closest followers were honored with one of these foci.

data.name: rusted ceremonial knife
data.description: What was once a bejeweled knife used in ceremonies is now rusted due to time in the slime. It still shimmers with a strange light.

data.name: sack lunch
data.description: This goblin's sack contains a disturbing assortment of bones and scraps.

data.name: sacrificial totem
data.description: A totem made from rotted wood. These are frequently found around sites used in Reaver rituals.

data.name: sailor's light
data.description: A simple amulet used by sailors in the Dominion of the Seven Winds. The luminescent glow was invaluable while out at sea where the cloud covered darkness often proved perilous.

data.name: salan's leather pouch
data.description: A leather coin purse passed down through the ages. Its original owner spent his childhood in the Imperial slums. As he was often robbed by cutthroats in the alley outside his home, he began carrying two pouches. One with his real money, hidden in his boot. The other with a few pieces of copper which he laced with a homebrewed poison.

data.name: sash of rapacious blood
data.description: Godsblood twisted by the primal prowess of Greed have awoken during the forging of this sash. Little experimentation has been done on the interaction of Godsblood and the primal magics. Our success here would suggest the two elements are no stranger to coexistence.

data.name: scarf of silence
data.description: A scarf favored by Teryssa during her youth as a Shadow Dancer. It is said young Teryssa looked upon the Great Mothers and saw not the promise of power, but a dream of freedom from her people’s struggles.

data.name: scrapwork oil
data.description: A small container of specialized oil favored by the Geartooth's Scavenge Runners.

data.name: scrapyard pendant
data.description: A small pedant constructed of scrap scavenged from around the Highlands. The Geartooth are infamous for the myriad of goods they have stolen and rebuilt to use against their previous owners. Gears within this pendant seem to have stopped functioning, but an arcane battery still thrums with life.

data.name: scribe's discarded ring
data.description: A ring seemingly discarded amongst the ruins of the Repository of Knowledge. It sings with Gloom energies, but the unstable nature of the power within seems to compromise the integrity of the ring.

data.name: scribe's first experiment
data.description: A ring seemingly discarded amongst the ruins of the Repository of Knowledge. It sings with Gloom energies, but the unstable nature of the power within seems to compromise the integrity of the ring.

data.name: scribe's notebook
data.description: A meticulously organized tome bearing notes and musings authored by the First Scribe. Damage to the text has made it mostly indecipherable, but the experimentation involved does denote an interest in the longevity of mortal creatures.

data.name: scribe's reliquary
data.description: A voice reached across darkness and the First Scribe listened.

data.name: seal of eternity
data.description: A collection of the secret names of the Architects, as complied by the Codex monks.

data.name: shade-threaded sash
data.description: A frayed sash sometimes worn by members the Silver Codex. Energies of the Gloom seem to have become infused within the fabric, coloring the thread with dark hues of Shadow.

data.name: shadestone sash
data.description: Drawn from the Echo Matrix, the Blackstone has mutated. The ethereal quality of shadow has given the stone a malleable form in resemblance of fabric. Equipping this garment feels as if dressing in shadow itself.

data.name: shadow-fused arrowhead
data.description: A stone arrowhead infused with Shadow, staining the stone with a deep purple coloration. This token has been fitted with a leather cord to wear as a necklace. Few of the Reaver clan are allowed the honor of using them.

data.name: shadow-inked journal
data.description: A personal journal written in ink infused with the essence of shadows. It belonged to Avaness, the infamous Eldren assassin who served House Harrakor during the Thousand Day's War. A few of the journal's pages are stained with the Grey Emperor's blood.

data.name: shadowborne ring
data.description: A ring fashioned from a gemstone infused with the Kiss of Shadow.

data.name: shadowstone deceiver
data.description: At first glance, this is a carving of a wooden chest. But it's acutally an Aerie totem representing the Deceiver—a beast that uses deception to defeat its prey. The Deceiver's guile will strengthen your attacks and expose your enemies' weaknesses.

data.name: shard of effigy core
data.description: A shard from the middle of a Reaver effigy. It pulses with a strange light.

data.name: shark tooth pendant
data.description: A simple pendant made of a large shark’s tooth bound with a leather cord. Dried blood still flakes the tooth, and in the right breeze, it still smells of iron and salt.

data.name: shattered creed
data.description: A ring once sported by the Archon Commander, Creed. The light of the Architects was said to have imbued the stone of this ring. It has since shattered and dimmed.

data.name: shimmering ashes
data.description: The ashes in this pouch continually shift in shade and scent. These are the raw embers of chaos, sifted from the Gloom, and their energy flows through you.

data.name: shrike heir's bag
data.description: Fragments and echoes have merged upon the Matrix here to form something new. This black box has been engraved with all the names of the Vex lineage who came before, and it will assuredly bear those who come after as well.

data.name: shrike supply sack
data.description: There is more food in here than any one person could eat in a year.

data.name: shuul's amulet
data.description: The amulet worn by Geartooth Shuuls. It is warm to the touch.

data.name: silence reforged
data.description: A piece of Teryssa's tarnished mantle, reforged into a relic of power. When the Lord of Swords fell to the Beacon's light, the Precursor's lifeforce elevated the Eldren under his banner, forever changing their mortal shells. Daunted by the enrapturing power burning in her veins, Teryssa cast her loyalties aside, rededicating herself to her people.

data.name: silver fleece
data.description: It is said, much like the Silver Codex itself, that which was formed of silver bore the Architects blessings.

data.name: silver scarf
data.description: A silver scarf worn by those capable of passing the Trial of Lingering Light. A rare honor.

data.name: silver shrike
data.description: Before the Gloom, the smugglers of the Shrike Syndicate were celebrated as folk heroes by the people of the Broken Coast. This Shrike medallion was worn with pride by the champions of the guild.

data.name: siren's fang
data.description: A single tooth taken from the maw of a siren. The size of this sharp fang tells a different tale than the rumors of their beauty might suggest.

data.name: smuggler's pin
data.description: A delicate pin that has rusted over time. There is a name engraved, but given the wear, only a 'K-' is legible. The jewel within has become saturated with Chaos.

data.name: smuggler's scarf
data.description: A scarf worn by a rookie smuggler on her first supply run as a subsitute mask. Her unpredictable nature has seeped into the threads infusing them with just a sliver of Chaos.

data.name: solar incense
data.description: Harvested in the Dominion of the Seven Winds, this incense is infused with Solar energy and carries the scent of rejuvenating flame.

data.name: solarborne ring
data.description: A ring fashioned from a gemstone infused with the strength of Solar.

data.name: songstress's pin
data.description: A silver pin with black highlights traditionally worn by Eldren songstresses. Despite the reputation they hold with the surface nations of Evenor, not all Eldren follow a warrior's creed.

data.name: spectacles of opulence
data.description: A pair of ornate glasses studded with precious stones. The Curator claims it will allow the wearer to see more clearly while using an opulence mutator, but its effect seems to have faded with time.

data.name: sphere of crystalized gloom
data.description: Raw Gloom energy held in perfect stasis. The Mother of Shadows showed the First wonders she could seldom comprehend. Her first experiments to replicate what she had seen produced this.

data.name: spider-eye mask
data.description: Black velvet mask inlaid with several spider eyes, petrified with an unwordly sheen. The eyes seem to follow your every movement.

data.name: spider’s fang
data.description: Large fang taken from one of the spiders that inhabit the mines. Poison occasionally drips from the end although it no longer has any potency.

data.name: spirit bottle
data.description: A small porcelain bottle carried by many Reavers. The liquid inside is sweet and pleasant but is said to slowly corrupt your soul until you yearn for nothing more but the strange liquid.

data.name: spirit of pyre
data.description: A pendant with a sliver of the primal Solar element encased in glass. Upon donning this item, the wearer’s body temperature rises considerably.

data.name: spoon of good fortune
data.description: A beautiful piece of silverware which once called the halls of the Avar Throne home. The wealth of the Royal Family was known far and wide, though little evidence of its origin is known.

data.name: spoon of pristine fortune
data.description: A golden spoon. Not only is it entrancing to the eye, but you cannot help but think you've had nothing but good luck since picking this trinket up! You should definitely not let anyone else ever take it from you. Or even look at it. It's yours. All yours.

data.name: spore pendant
data.description: A smattering of bioluminescent mushroom spores have been trapped within the gem of this pendant. Beneath the shade of the forest canopy, the spores shall light your way.

data.name: startouched vambrace
data.description: A vambrace found amongst the remains of a vanquished Gloomtear. The armor looks foreign to any known cultures, and it is seemingly soaked with concentrated Gloom energies.

data.name: stone of chaos
data.description: A gemstone found abandoned in the Frostmarch. It was been addled by the force of Chaos.

data.name: stone of flora
data.description: A gemstone found abandoned in the Frostmarch. It was been nurtured by the force of Flora.

data.name: stone of greed
data.description: A gemstone found abandoned in the Frostmarch. It was been tempted by the force of Greed.

data.name: stone of shadow
data.description: A gemstone found abandoned in the Frostmarch. It was been gripped by the force of Shadow.

data.name: stone of silence
data.description: It is clear someone fragmented this black stone with purpose.

data.name: stone of solar
data.description: A gemstone found abandoned in the Frostmarch. It has been bolstered by the force of Solar.

data.name: stoneskin amulet
data.description: Stoneskin amulets fell briefly into vogue at the height of the Mazewar. Imperial soldiers claimed the smooth stones they brought home were prizes wrested from the corpses of chimeric basilisks, though Avar researchers commonly understand the rumors of basilisk’s stoney gaze to be greatly exaggerated.

data.name: stoneskin bracer
data.description: Grotesque statues infamously populate the labyrinth of Cairn 02. Citizens of the Godmaze believe the statue’s eternally tortured visages to be the parting gift of a great beast which now slumbers beneath the Pyrolith.

data.name: stoneskin ring
data.description: According to Dominion researchers, the stone found atop this ring is commonly found in basilisk nests. Though the exact source of the material is still unknown.

data.name: storm lord's ring
data.description: The Arcane Lords of the Dominion were known to wear rings fashioned from crystallized Storm Jellies when visiting areas plagued with unrelenting tempests. It was thought in the event of a lightning strike, the ring might absorb the primal energies in their stead.

data.name: storm wielder
data.description: The vambrace of a Storm Shrike. Despite its sturdy construction, its surface has become charred from contact with Storm energies.

data.name: storm's fury
data.description: A pendant with a piece of a Storm elemental encased in glass. The wearer’s hair will float occasionally.

data.name: sunspot cloak
data.description: Spots of blinding sunshine make this garment impossible to look at for long. A curse to you and your enemies both. If you were able to find some kind of shaded, sun-proof glasses, perhaps it would be a bit more useful.

data.name: sunsteel salamander
data.description: This icon is warm to the touch. Sunsteel channels solar energy, and you can feel the fury of the salamander burning within it.

data.name: tablet of forgotten wisdom
data.description: The secrets known by The Argent Hand were only eclipsed by the knowledge of the First herself. In their final hours, the Hand rallied to distill their wisdom upon these tablets. Only those who are worthy are able to read their contents.

data.name: tales of the aerie
data.description: A beautiful tome with shining pages. It describes heroic tales of riders on unicorn mounts, descending the high mountains to slay whatever evils might thrive below.

data.name: tales of the geartooth
data.description: A tattered tome written in the language of goblinkind. While the text is indiscernible to you, sketches inked into the yellowed pages detail a world of chaos and ruin.

data.name: tales of the trade
data.description: A red-leather tome filled with tales traditionally told by merchants and travelers along the Trade Road. In times past, they provided comfort in the darkness.

data.name: talon's shard
data.description: A blazing crystal found near the wreckage caused by the Talon of Pyre. It is impossible to touch without some kind of protection from the heat.

data.name: tangled comb
data.description: The tines of this wooden comb are twisted in intriguing patterns. Made by one of the great Woodwalkers of the Frostmarch, it reflects the deep and twisting roots of the wind and channels the element of Flora.

data.name: tattered cape
data.description: The tattered remains of an Archon officer's cape. Chaos energies have seeped into the threading, inking the garment with a touch of violet.

data.name: teak turtlesaur
data.description: The essence-weavers of the Golden Aerie say that the universe is comprised of a chain of turtlesaurs, each one larger than the one above. This talisman draws on the power of the Turtlesaur Below This World, infusing the bearer with fearsome might.

data.name: tears of the witch
data.description: A small vial harboring a single tear stolen in the Protean Witch's final moments. The prismatic beauty is difficult to look away from.

data.name: tearsoaked amulet
data.description: Though it was she who stood as the lone victor, it was the Fatebreaker’s tears that flooded the Shatterlands. Her great love, perished, not for she but the callous creators which betrayed them.

data.name: tearsoaked ring
data.description: The Shadow Nation speaks of their birth from blood. Yet power wells from the great ones’ tears too. The mourning of what could have been.

data.name: templar's creed
data.description: This book holds the writ given to Halus Aer, the first Archon and champion of the Imperial church; it imbues the bearer with a fraction of his zeal and determination.

data.name: tendril totem
data.description: A glass jar with a tendril from a Gloom creature inside. Unknown magic keeps the tendril from breaking out despite the many cracks in the glass.

data.name: tenet of dedication
data.description: Writings on the sixth tenet of the Archons.

data.name: tenet of devotion
data.description: Writings on the fifth tenet of the Archon.

data.name: tenet of humility
data.description: A golden spoon. Not only is it entrancing to the eye, but you cannot help but think you've had nothing but good luck since picking this trinket up! You should definitely not let anyone else ever take it from you. Or even look at it. It's yours. All yours.

data.name: tenet of restraint
data.description: Writings on the eleventh tenet of the Archons.

data.name: tenet of valor
data.description: Writings on the third tenet of the Archons.

data.name: testament box
data.description: A simple box with golden highlights in the style of the Aurelian monastery. Few monks were said to have survived the Trial of Lingering Light. Tradition dictated those hoping to face the trial write their last will and testament on a single sheet of parchment to be locked in a Testament Box.

data.name: the silver codex
data.description: Inscribed in silver ink, this small book contains the faith and mantras of the Silver Codex monks.

data.name: the song of fire
data.description: This book holds hymns to the Conquering Sun written in gleaming gold ink. The Brotherhold of the Flame would praise this Architect before each battle, promising to fight until they were reduced to ashes.

data.name: the strength of solar
data.description: Leatherbound book given to you by the Curator. He claims it describes how to use Solar to its fullest potential, but the pages shine so brightly, they are impossible to read.

data.name: the tactician's pouch
data.description: A worn leather pouch used for keeping arcanic powders oft used in rifles. The initials read S.V.

data.name: titan core
data.description: Large, smooth core taken from the Gloom Titan. It pulses Gloom energy and cycles between feeling molten hot and freezing cold.

data.name: titan’s essence
data.description: Ichor that spilled from the Gloom Titan gathered into a simple glass bottle. When shaken, it expands and fills the bottle causing it to become warm to the touch.

data.name: tome of silence
data.description: The book's pages are black as the void. In perpetuity it reads: "They are waking. They are waking. They are waking. They are waking. They are waking..."

data.name: tossed sash
data.description: A beautiful garment weaved with Shadow. It was worn only once. After an onset of snickers from an unamed Shrike lieutenant, both the sash and the lieutenant were never seen again.

data.name: transport guidance manual
data.description: A piece of tattered cloth used as masks by workers in the Bloodworks so that they might not breathe in arcanic fumes.

data.name: turtlesaur plushie
