data.description: The most adorable thing in the world.

data.name: turtlesaur spikes bracelet
data.description: A bracelet made of spikes from a turtlesaur's limbs.

data.name: twisted totem
data.description: Once a totem carved in the visage of a spirit of these woods, the figure has become twisted and gnarled. A large hole rots within the totem's torso where all wish and whisper seem to disappear within.

data.name: venom's heart
data.description: Though she had vast armies, the Venom Queen took great joy in personally assassinating her enemies. She forged this emerald ring to reveal the weakness of her foes, allowing her to eliminate the strongest enemy with a single critical hit.

data.name: vine totem
data.description: A vine with a pink flower encased in a small orb Gloom swirls around inside, slowly darkening the vine and its flower.

data.name: voidborne gemstone
data.description: A darkling fragment found within the void.

data.name: voidborne ring
data.description: Whosoever bore this ring saw fit to cast it into the dark.

data.name: voidborne tome
data.description: Can you hear it call your name?

data.name: volatile heart
data.description: A heart stolen from the largest wolf in the pack. The organ has hardened to resemble a strange crystal pulsing with explosive arcanic power.

data.name: volatile paw
data.description: An arcanic instrument in the style of a wolf's paw. Surges of impossible and explosive savagery fill the bearer seemingly at a whim, only to leave them without warning. It is said the call of Chaos can become addicting to those who do not tread carefully.

data.name: warbear fang earrings
data.description: The fangs from a warbear fashioned into matching earrings. The ends are slightly tinted with blood.

data.name: warrior's pin
data.description: A darkling pin, stolen from the attire of an Eldren warrior. Darkness guide their hand.

data.name: winner's circlet
data.description: An armband engraved with the phrase "I'm a winner." Upon equipping this band you feel a surge of unearned confidence.

data.name: witch's bracer
data.description: A rustic bracer fashioned to channel the tainted power of Flora flowing through the Heart of the Woods. Whomever created this relic was vested in the primal powers and clearly seeks their return.

data.name: witch's circlet
data.description: A circlet traditionally worn by sorceresses respected by the Woodwen people. It is the duty of those closest to the old powers to place the Petrified Crown upon the Woodwen King's brow.

data.name: witch's focus
data.description: A focus once used by students of the Protean Witch's craft. It still seizes with Chaos.

data.name: woodknot ring
data.description: Carved from a bough of the First Tree, the woodknot ring is infused with positive energy and strengthens the lifeforce of the bearer. These rings come from the Frostmarch, where they are celebrated in the song "Would Not, Woodknot."

data.name: woodwen totem
data.description: A small totem made from scavenged sticks, feathers and bones. Once used in cleansing rituals by the Woodwen peoples, this totem has not seen use in many moons.

data.name: wurm's fore-leg
data.description: A vial of the acid spewed by the Wurms in the Kragan Highlands. Might be good if you need to dissolve something in a pinch.

data.name: wurm's pincer
data.description: One of the great Wurm's pincers. The monstrosity's fearsome strength now belongs to you.

data.name: arcane fragments
data.description: Arcane Fragments are automatically consumed to grant extra charges of Savage Rake. Generate Arcane Fragments by using Siphon Radiant on enemies, and landing combo finishers.

data.name: arcane fragments
data.description: Arcane Fragments are automatically consumed to grant extra charges of Savage Rake. Generate Arcane Fragments by using Siphon Radiant on enemies, and landing combo finishers.

data.name: savage rake
data.description: Rakes the ground with violent energy, dealing damage to all enemies in front of Kyros. Arcane Fragments can be consumed to cast Savage Rake without using an ability charge.

data.name: savage rake
data.description: Rakes the ground with violent energy, dealing damage to all enemies in front of Kyros. Arcane Fragments can be consumed to cast Savage Rake without using an ability charge.

data.name: siphon radiant
data.description: Releases a wave of energy around Kyros that damages enemies and absorbs arcane power, reducing cooldowns and granting an Arcane Fragment.

data.name: siphon radiant
data.description: Releases a wave of energy around Kyros that damages enemies and absorbs arcane power, reducing cooldowns and granting an Arcane Fragment.

data.name: arcane focus
data.description: Marks enemies in the immediate area. Mark increases in power as the marked target is hit. After reaching max power or after 8 seconds, the mark explodes, dealing damage based on the power of the mark.

data.name: arcane focus
data.description: Marks enemies in the immediate area. Mark increases in power as the marked target is hit. After reaching max power or after 8 seconds, the mark explodes, dealing damage based on the power of the mark.

data.name: hand of reckoning
data.description: Deals massive damage to enemies in a large radius around Kyros.

data.name: hand of reckoning
data.description: Deals massive damage to enemies in a large radius around Kyros.

data.name: lingering shadow
data.description: After dodging, gain AP for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.

data.name: vengeful shade
data.description: Briefly become immune to attacks while damaging enemies around Niss. Following up with a Light or Heavy Attack causes Niss to slam back down, further damaging enemies. Following up with a Dodge causes Niss to backflip away.

data.name: umbral aura
data.description: Niss is empowered by Umbral magic, causing her next three dodges to pierce a nearby enemy with shadow. Nearby allies are also empowered for one dodge.

data.name: shadow step
data.description: Dash in a line, dealing damage along the way. After a short delay a gloom clone will dash from your initial position to you, dealing damage to enemies it passes through.

data.name: gloom shroud
data.description: For 10 seconds, Shadow Step can be used at no cost.

data.name: crowd favorite
data.description: Holding input for Gladiator Pummel and Gain Favor abilities will cause Senja to Showboat. While Showboating, she cannot be staggered, takes reduced damage, and increases the Crowd's Favor. As the crowd's favor increases, Senja gains Weapon Power and Ability Power.

data.name: gladiator pummel
data.description: Punch forward, then hold to Showboat. On release Senja punches again. Fully Showboating increases the damage of the followup punch.

data.name: gain favor
data.description: Hold to Showboat for the roaring crowd. On release, taunts nearby enemies while buffing Senja and her allies, increasing Weapon Power and Ability Power for 10 seconds.

data.name: lightning grasp
data.description: Use lightning to damage and pull all displaceable enemies in a large cone towards Senja.

data.name: grand finale
data.description: In the form of a lightning spear, Senja charges to smash an enemy, dealing massive damage to them and fully filling the Crowd's Favor.

data.name: healing pulse
data.description: Melee finishers heal Wingrave and 1 nearby ally.

data.name: radiant pulse
data.description: Forms a divine shield that blocks projectiles and grants a defense boost to allies standing behind the shield. When the shield forms, it sends out a Radiant Pulse, dealing damage to enemies in front of the shield.

data.name: righteous strike
data.description: Performs a powerful radiant strike. Incoming damage is reduced by 25% while performing the ability, and hitting an enemy will cause an explosion of healing energy to heal Wingrave and nearby allies. Cooldown refreshed upon using a melee finisher.

data.name: judgement
data.description: Marks enemies for judgement. Anyone hitting a Judged enemy will restore their own health.

data.name: divine aegis
data.description: Creates a powerful barrier that protects Wingrave and all allies inside of it, making them immune to all damage and healing them over time while standing in the barrier.

data.name: strategic advantage
data.description: Deals 10% bonus Melee and Ranged Standard Shot damage to enemies that are debuffed (slow, burning, poisoned, stunned etc).

data.name: fire bomb
data.description: Toss a fire bomb that ignites enemies, dealing damage over time. Causes a chain reaction with Oil Bomb, resulting in a large explosion.

data.name: oil bomb
data.description: Leaves a pool of oil in front of Silo, slowing enemies. Enemies directly hit by the bomb are also Oiled, remaining slowed even after leaving the oil pool and taking additional damage when ignited by Fire Bomb. Refreshes a charge of Fire Bomb.

data.name: proto-clone
data.description: Dash backwards, leaving behind a clone that pulls nearby enemies in. The clone will taunt nearby enemies into attacking it until it expires.

data.name: ARC nemesis
data.description: Silo sends out EGG to shock all enemies in the area dealing a burst of damage. EGG remains in the area for a short time, slowing and damaging nearby enemies.

data.name: master of venoms
data.description: Weapon hits apply Venom, dealing damage over time and stacking up to 5 times. Weapon hits against enemies with 5 stacks of Venom create a Poison Cloud that deals damage and applies stacks of Venom. A Poison Cloud can only be created by this effect once every five seconds.

data.name: transfusion
data.description: Weapon hits apply Venom, dealing damage over time and stacking up to 5 times. Weapon hits against enemies with 5 stacks of Venom create a Poison Cloud that deals damage and applies stacks of Venom. A Poison Cloud can only be created by this effect once every five seconds.

data.name: vampiric blast
data.description: Launch a bomb that absorbs up to 5 nearby Poison Clouds. After a brief delay, the bomb explodes, dealing damage to enemies and healing allies based on the number of Poison Clouds absorbed.

data.name: venom thrusters
data.description: Dash in a direction, leaving a trail of Poison Clouds behind you. Poison Clouds damage and apply stacks of Venom to enemies.

data.name: deep breath
data.description: Fire a massive explosion that damages and applies 5 stacks of Empowered Venom to enemies. Empowered Venom deals damage over time and counts as additional stacks of Venom for the Master of Venoms and Transfusion abilities.

data.name: arcbeam
data.description: Fires a piercing beam in a line dealing high damage and ignoring defenses. Consumes 1 Locked and Loaded charge.

data.name: healing pulse
data.description: Heals the wayfinder and nearby allies. Power increases for each Latent Power Pip consumed.

data.name: gladiator slice
data.description: Performs a quick Melee attack that buffs Ability Power by 20% for the next Wayfinder Ability used within 3 seconds. Consumes 1 level of momentum per use. Using Gladiator Slice again within 6 seconds will perform an Empowered Gladiator Slice, dealing an additional 20% damage, up to 2 times.

data.name: arcane harvest
data.description: A spinning slash that deals damage in a 360 arc and steals Ability Power from enemies.

data.name: bone geyser
data.description: Plunges the sword into the ground to unleash an eruption of Bone Spikes in a radius around the Wayfinder, dealing damage and staggering even Heavily Armored enemies. Deals additional damage for each Latent Power Pip consumed.

data.name: light and shadow
data.description: Creates a sigil of light and shadow on the ground, damaging enemies. Enemies and allies within the sigil are imbued with either light or shadow. You are imbued with both. Players deal bonus damage to enemies imbued with the opposite effect.

data.name: volcano
data.description: Fires a slow moving vortex that builds in size as it travels and deals damage over time to anything inside of it.

data.name: deadeye
data.description: Spawns Deadeye Weakpoints on enemies in range. Shooting a Weakpoint deals additional damage and is guaranteed to crit. Consumes 1 Locked and Loaded charge.

data.name: daggerfall
data.description: Forms mutliple Magical daggers that fly at nearby enemies.

data.name: wyvern's fury
data.description: Reloads the gun with an empowered clip. During this clip, the weapon is fully automatic and every bullet is infused to apply a stack of Poison on hit. Poison is a small DoT that stacks up to 20 times and deals damage over 6 seconds.

data.name: archon's blade
data.description: Empowers the sword and shield with radiant energy. Extends damage and range of melee attacks, and empowers blocking to greatly reduce incoming stamina damage.

data.name: scattershot
data.description: Fires multiple projectiles in a blast, while evading backwards. Consumes 1 Locked and Loaded charge.

data.name: steel volley
data.description: Spins and throws daggers in a large radius around the Wayfinder.

data.name: bullet storm
data.description: Consumes all Locked and Loaded charges and fires 2 rapid blasts per charge.

data.name: molten cleave
data.description: Consumes all momentum to cleave the ground and damage enemies in a line. The resulting cracks will pulse damage over a short period of time after the initial strike.

data.name: shredder toss
data.description: Launches the shield to tear through and bounce between enemies. Deals additional damage for each Latent Power Pip consumed.

data.name: shatter
data.description: Consumes all Momentum to perform a strong overhead slam. A direct hit will Sunder the target, increasing all damage taken by 10% per Momentum Level consumed, for 10 seconds.

data.name: power bash
data.description: Performs a powerful shield bash that does massive impact and guard break damage.

data.name: viper sting
data.description: Perform a leaping stab attack that imbues your daggers with poison for the duration of Blade Dance, stacking a poison with each hit that deals damage over time. Stacks 10 times.

data.name: ransom
data.description: The infamous highwayman Duskyn Dodge was the first to carry Ransom. It's had many wielders since then—scoundrels, every one.

data.name: slicer & dicer
data.description: A traditional weapon of the Shrike smugglers, as sharp as the talons of their namesake.

data.name: tempest
data.description: Tempest's origins are a mystery, but its power is undeniable.

data.name: titan's bane
data.description: The Infinite Warmaster forged this blade to battle the titans of stone in the first age, and the earth still bleeds at its touch.

data.name: tooth and claw
data.description: Forged for a champion of the Maze, Tooth and Claw carved a bloody path through the Avar frontier. It hungers for battle.

data.name: typhoon
data.description: First wielded by Calas Sky-Cleaver, this axe is blessed by the spirits of sky and stone and strikes with the fury of the storm.

data.name: vanguard
data.description: Forged by the legendary smith Torlyn Irontongue. His smithy was razed in the Mazewars, but his legacy remains in this mighty weapon.

data.name: venom
data.description: Once wielded by Renvi the Rotted, the poisoned blades known as Venom were feared by any who dared cross the Eldren of the Viridescent Woods. A single prick might spell your end.

data.name: radiant dawn
data.description: The tools of the first Archon Inquisitor. The blade was forged to strike down evil, the shield to protect the innocent from harm.

data.name: nightshade
data.description: The Venomess designed many weapons for the Maze, but Nightshade she made for herself. Its needles are infused with the venom of the Orlake Wyvern, ensuring a swift and painful demise.

data.name: arcstorm
data.description: At the height of the Twilight Heresy, the Archon Astalis ordered the Spellforge to create an arcanic plasma projector of unparalleled power. Arcstorm cost more than entire legion, but it served Astalis well in his final battle against the Shadowbringers.

data.name: bastion
data.description: The names of the Celestial Architects are woven into the steel, and a champion with faith can still call on their light.

data.name: colossus
data.description: The ceremonial weapon of the champion of the Imperial Arena, used only in the most important matches. It's deeply insulting to use this glorious blade against goblins and Shrikes.

data.name: epitaph
data.description: Crafted by the infamous Mother of Shadows, Epitaph feeds on the essence of its enemies even as it spills their blood. It whispers to you, urging you to battle.

data.name: grim harvest
data.description: Throughout history, every champion who's carried Grim Harvest has died a gruesome death—but only after vanquishing their enemies. Who will be the next to fall prey to this curse.

data.name: harvest moon
data.description: The Silver Codex's earliest excavations in Aurelien uncovered peculiar structures dedicated to the study of the night sky. Buried within those ruins was the artifact now known as Harvest Moon.

data.name: hellswarm
data.description: The champions of the Maze prefer close range brutality to finesse. The Hellswarm unleashes devastating blasts that rip through enemy squads.

data.name: longshot
data.description: Longshot was built by Salan Vex, the first Shrike. He won a fortune from the Avar Reeve in a high-stakes shooting contest, and used this gold to found his network of smugglers.

data.name: night's edge
data.description: The ancestral blades of the Deep Eldren. The spirits of the fallen are bound to these daggers, and strike out at the enemies of a worthy wielder.

data.name: heroic kyros
data.description: Dishes out massive damage with his spells. Although he has few defensive tools, Kyros is able to store energy in the form of Arcane Fragments, which he can use to unleash a barrage of Savage Rakes.

data.name: kyros
data.description: Dishes out massive damage with his spells. Although he has few defensive tools, Kyros is able to store energy in the form of Arcane Fragments, which he can use to unleash a barrage of Savage Rakes.

data.name: niss
data.details: Elusive master of shadows, manipulating gloom to destroy her foes while darting around the battlefield.
data.description: Niss is one of the sinister fey known as the Eldren. She and her clan rejected the Precursors, and now she is hunted by her own people. A deadly assassin wielding powers over shadow, she has joined forces with the Seekers so she can take vengeance on the Precursors. As an Arcanist, Niss can unleash devastating attacks but relies on her speed and the shadows to evade her foes. She can teleport across the battlefield and summon shadow-clones to strike at her enemies.

data.name: senja
data.details: Senja loves to put on a show and gains power as the crowd in her mind reacts to her battles. She delights in close combat, and can stagger foes with a mighty pummel and keep the attention of the enemies on her as she shrugs off their blows.
data.description: The last initiate of the deadly Iron Sisters, Senja was the beloved champion of the Imperial arena. In a world broken by the Gloom, she’s chosen to fight for the Seekers. Senja is always seeking greater challenges, and she intends to personally crush the Precursors. Senja is a mighty Warmaster who strikes like lightning and crushes enemies with her armor fists. She is driven by a crowd that only she can hear, and draws power from grandstanding performances.

data.name: wingrave
data.details: The most sturdy of the Wayfinders, able to support and heal his team while smiting foes in melee combat.
data.description: Wingrave is a templar clad in spell-forged armor and sustained by his faith in the Architects. He’s a natural leader and true champion, always ready to defend the innocent and to smite the forces of evil. As a Warmaster, Wingrave excels at close combat. He specializes in supporting allies, summoning shields of light and healing his allies even as he calls down divine judgement on his enemies.

data.name: silo
data.details: Uses gadgets and bombs to slow, ignite, or taunt enemies, overcoming his foes with tactics and style. Able to combo his bombs for additional effect. His abilities allow him to stay effective even at range.
data.description: Silo is a wisecracking smuggler, equally quick with a quip and a bomb. His people played both sides of the war between the Empire and the Maze, and Silo doesn’t care about politics; he wants to help the common people and to prove what he can do. As a Survivalist, Silo is a versatile combatant with a bag full of tricks. He can distract his enemies with illusions and take down mobs with powerful area effects.

data.name: venomess
data.details: Master chemist, using poisons to wear away her foes, and heal over time effects to support her team.
data.description: Ven was the greatest spy of the monstrous Maze. Alchemically enhanced and equipped with tools of her own devising, she was codenamed Venomess. With the Maze lost in the Gloom, Venomess now fights for the Seekers. Venomess is a versatile Survivalist. She heals her allies even as she poisons her enemies, and controls the battlefield with her toxic clouds.
